Path *now* treats backslash as a valid character on Linux, so our code that 
creates a path is now invalid:

File file = LaunchingPlugin.getFileInPlugin(new Path
("lib\\launchingsupport.jar")); //$NON-NLS-1$

Changed to

File file = LaunchingPlugin.getFileInPlugin(new Path
("lib/launchingsupport.jar")); //$NON-NLS-1$
